Index

A B E F G I M P R S T U W 
All Classes|All Packages

A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class fdmBoggle.gui.ButtonManager
Is called whenever a BoggleButton is clicked or when the enter button is pushed If the button is the enter button, the text in all active buttons are combined to form a word, then this word is entered into the active boggle game via enterword If enterWord() returns true, the score in the gui is updated and the word is added to the list of entered words If the button is an active button, it and all following buttons are removed from the active buttons list If the button is an available button, it is appended to active buttons list If the button is neither active nor available, the activeButtons list is wiped clean and a new one is started from the selected button After any of these operations, the available buttons list is updated and the board is coloured appropriately
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class fdmBoggle.gui.Gui
Calls this.reset()

B

BoardGenerator - Class in fdmBoggle.game
This class contains one static method which returns a 4 * 4 board based on a specific text file containing the game "dice" It's constructor is private.
Boggle - Class in fdmBoggle.game
This object manages the game logic Is made to function both in tournament mode and game mode
Boggle() - Constructor for class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Calls reset() Sets private field tournament mode to false
Boggle(boolean) - Constructor for class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Calls reset() - sets private field tournamentMode to entered parameter
Boggle(String[][], boolean) - Constructor for class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Calls reset(String[][] board)
BoggleButton - Class in fdmBoggle.gui
A slightly modified JButton with a default background colour, and a set of x, y co-ordinates Used to represent a letter / string on the board
BoggleButton(int, int) - Constructor for class fdmBoggle.gui.BoggleButton
Default constructor
BoggleDictionary - Class in fdmBoggle.ai
Class used by WordGetter to store and search through a dictionary Cannot be instantiated
BoggleException - Exception in fdmBoggle.game
Custom exception class for this game
BoggleException(String) - Constructor for exception fdmBoggle.game.BoggleException
 
BogglePlayer - Class in fdmBoggle.tournament
An abstract class created for the tournament All players must have their classes extend this
BogglePlayer() - Constructor for class fdmBoggle.tournament.BogglePlayer
 
buildDictionary(File) - Method in class fdmBoggle.tournament.BogglePlayer
Build the dictionary using this file The file have one word on each line Hint - use a HashSet to store the words
ButtonManager - Class in fdmBoggle.gui
ActionListener that is added to all BoggleButtons Is used to keep track of all active buttons and available buttons, as well as entering words "Active" buttons are buttons currently being used to construct a word.
ButtonManager(BoggleButton[][], Gui) - Constructor for class fdmBoggle.gui.ButtonManager
Default constructor
bx - Variable in class fdmBoggle.gui.BoggleButton
Represents x value of button
by - Variable in class fdmBoggle.gui.BoggleButton
Represents y value of button

E

enterWord(String) - Method in class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Used to enter a word - Returns true and increments score appropriately if word is valid score is incremented by 1 if length = 3-4, 2 if length = 5, 3 if length = 6, 5 if length = 7, 11 if length = 8 or higher Will return false if word is valid but has already been entered.

F

fdmBoggle.ai - package fdmBoggle.ai
 
fdmBoggle.game - package fdmBoggle.game
 
fdmBoggle.gui - package fdmBoggle.gui
 
fdmBoggle.tournament - package fdmBoggle.tournament
 
finish() - Method in class fdmBoggle.gui.ButtonManager
Is called when the game times out Disables all BoggleButtons

G

generateBoard() - Static method in class fdmBoggle.game.BoardGenerator
Generates a 4 * 4 board Uses a text file '$HOME/Documents/data/dice.txt' to build board.
getBoard() - Method in class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Returns 4 * 4 2D String array representing board
getDefaultScore() - Method in class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Used in tournaments to get total score for 'Default player'
getDefaultTime() - Method in class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Used in tournaments to get time taken for the 'Default' player
getLegalWords(Boggle) - Static method in class fdmBoggle.ai.WordGetter
Returns set of legalWords
getScore() - Method in class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
returns current score from all entered words since last reset
Gui - Class in fdmBoggle.gui
A dedicated gui class for the boggle game
Gui() - Constructor for class fdmBoggle.gui.Gui
The default constructor Sets all fields and Gui components Creates Boggle board instance Creates ButtonManager instance and adds it to all appropriate buttons Adds itself as an actionListener to reset button

I

init() - Static method in class fdmBoggle.ai.BoggleDictionary
Builds internal dictionary Will be called automatically if not called before wordIsLegal() Uses dictionary file "dict.txt" at "$HOME/Documents/data/" Automatically shuts down JVM if file does not exist

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class fdmBoggle.gui.Gui
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class fdmBoggle.tournament.Tournament
Calls runTournament(int noOfGames) with the first entered value as noOfGames

P

playGame(Boggle) - Method in class fdmBoggle.tournament.BogglePlayer
Enters all words the player can find into the entered boggle game Once this ends, the score will be checked by the tournament object as well as the time this method took to execute
printBoard() - Method in class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Prints 4 * 4 prepresentation of param board to the CLI

R

reset() - Method in class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Calls BoardGenerator and WordGetter to generate board and legalWords Sets score to 0 If field tournamentMode is set to true, this object will record the time taken by the WordGetter
reset() - Method in class fdmBoggle.gui.ButtonManager
Is called whenever the active Boggle game has been reset Sets all the text of the BoggleButtons and resets active and available buttons
reset() - Method in class fdmBoggle.gui.Gui
Calls reset on active Boggle game Updates all appropriate components
reset(String[][]) - Method in class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Sets param board to entered value Generates new set of legalWords for this entered board Resets score to 0
resetScoreAndGuesses() - Method in class fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
Sets param score to 0 and field guessedWords to an empty list Used to 'recycle' a game in tournament mode
runTournament(int) - Static method in class fdmBoggle.tournament.Tournament
Builds all players from class files which should be present at "$HOME/Documents/players" Will abort if directory does not exist Then creates a number of Boggle games specified by the entered parameter One by one, makes each player play each game and records their results (time, score, score/time) in a csv file in Documents Is able to handle exceptions during player class instantiation and while the player is playing the game Also records the score for the WordGetter used to create the legalWords field in the boggle games This is used as the "Default" player for all others to be compared to

S

setBoggle(Boggle) - Method in class fdmBoggle.gui.ButtonManager
Used to set private Boggle game field

T

toString() - Method in class fdmBoggle.tournament.BogglePlayer
Returns the class name
Tournament - Class in fdmBoggle.tournament
Contains one static method to run tournament Cannot be instantiated

U

updateScore() - Method in class fdmBoggle.gui.Gui
Updates visible score

W

WordGetter - Class in fdmBoggle.ai
A class with one static method to return a set of legalWords for a particular game Class has a private constructor and cannot be instantiated
wordIsLegal(String) - Static method in class fdmBoggle.ai.BoggleDictionary
Returns true if entered word is legal Will call init if it hasn't already been called
